description: The giant lily is a truly amazing species of plant. Found in the wet and temperate forests of the Himalayas and Yunnan Province in China, its impressive size and unique beauty have made it a must-have for plant enthusiasts. Its large white bell-shaped flowers can reach up to 2" in diameter and the plant itself can grow up to 7' tall with its stunningly long leaves. The giant lily blooms every two to three years, making its appearance even more special. Along with its stunning beauty and impressive size, the giant lily is also very hardy and known to survive many seasons with little care. With its unmistakable form and undeniable charm, the giant lily is an incredible plant to witness in person.
